Title: Notre ami le roi (1993)
Type: Biography of Hassan II of Morocco
Notes: Banned in Morocco. This book is a biography of King Hassan and examines cases of torture, killing, and political imprisonment said to have been carried out by the Moroccan Government at his orders.

Title: Le roi prédateur (2012)
Notes: Banned in Morocco. This book makes allegedly "defamatory" accusations of corruption against Mohammed VI of Morocco, after investigating the exponential growth of his wealth.
